snippet: For the second consecutive year, a school bathroom renovation project was chosen by Councilman Brad Lander’s constituents for financing through a program known as participatory budgeting.
abstract: For the second consecutive year, a school bathroom renovation project was chosen by Councilman Brad Lander’s constituents for financing through a program known as participatory budgeting.

headline.main: Public Money Goes to School Toilets, Brooklyn Voters Decide
